# HVPDB Tools Plugin

Developer tooling, benchmarking, and debugging utilities for **HVPDB**.

This is an official plugin for [HVPDB (High Velocity Python Database)](https://github.com/8w6s/hvpdb).

## Installation

```bash
pip install hvpdb-tools
```

## Usage

```bash
# Run benchmark
hvpdb-bench --ops 10000
```
